head.supplied: 19/8/66 ¶ ¶ The Comte de Beauvoir having expressed a desire to possess some of the botanical works published by Government I have the honor of submitting this requisition for the favorable considerat...

div.p: O66/8392, unit 189, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

The Comte de Beauvoir having expressed a desire to possess some of the botanical works published by Government I have the honor of submitting this requisition for the favorable consideration of the hon. the Chief Secretary.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. Mueller
M's requisition was approved and forwarded to the Government Printer.
